text.div:
Generated Narrative: CodeSystem cs-guideline-author-role

This case-insensitive code system http://fhir.awmf.org/awmf.ig/CodeSystem/cs-guideline-author-role defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinitionDeutsch (German, de)
leading LeadingMain party responsible for the development of the guideline.Federführend
contributing ContributingParty involved in the development of the guideline.Beteiligt
registrant RegistrantPerson responsible for registering the guideline in the registry.Anmelder*in
technical-editor Technical EditorResponsible for preparing the technical or machine-readable format of the guideline.Technische Redaktion
content-author Content AuthorAuthored or co-authored the content of the guideline.Inhaltliche*r Autor*in
coding-author Coding AuthorResponsible for semantic encoding of guideline content using terminologies or ontologies.Kodierer*in
moderator ModeratorPerson moderating consensus-building sessions in guideline development.Moderator*in
method-advisor Methodological AdvisorSupports the development team with methodological expertise.Methodische*r Berater*in
evidence-analyst Evidence AnalystConducts or oversees evidence synthesis and appraisal.Evidenzaufbereitung

name: GuidelineAuthorRoleCS
title: Guideline Author Role
description: CodeSystem defining roles for the author of the guideline.

concept.definition: Main party responsible for the development of the guideline.

extension.valueString: Federführende Organisation oder Person für die Leitlinie.

concept.definition: Party involved in the development of the guideline.

extension.valueString: Organisation oder Person, die an der Leitlinie mitgewirkt hat.

concept.definition: Person responsible for registering the guideline in the registry.

extension.valueString: Die Person, die das Leitlinienprojekt im Register angemeldet hat.

concept.definition: Responsible for preparing the technical or machine-readable format of the guideline.

extension.valueString: Verantwortlich für die technische oder maschinenlesbare Formatierung der Leitlinie.

concept.definition: Authored or co-authored the content of the guideline.
Responsible for semantic encoding of guideline content using terminologies or ontologies.

extension.valueString: Verantwortlich für die semantische Kodierung der Leitlinie mittels Terminologien oder Ontologien.

concept.definition: Person moderating consensus-building sessions in guideline development.

extension.valueString: Moderiert den Konsensprozess während der Leitlinienentwicklung.

concept.definition: Supports the development team with methodological expertise.
Conducts or oversees evidence synthesis and appraisal.

extension.valueString: Verantwortlich für die Recherche, Bewertung und Aufbereitung der Evidenz.
